DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this study is to provide gait parameters as a new objective method to assess total knee arthroplasty outcome between patients with fixed- and mobile-bearing, using an ambulatory device with minimal sensor configuration.
DOC.brief_title: Total Knee Arthroplasty: Comparison of Fixed and Mobile Bearings
DOC.criteria: Patients suffering from a primary unilateral knee osteoarthritis and requiring a knee replacement Informed consent
